name: OUTRESIDE: Gravebourne
description:
The town of Gravebourne has been taken over by intergalactic invaders. They turned its people into brainwashed zombies, and established an installation to harvest the town for energy. 

It is up to you, NXS Agent Lilian H. Rook, to drive the invaders out of Gravebourne by any means necessary, and prevent them from spreading their influence to the rest of Neumont. 

_________________________________________________________________

This game was made for the 7DFPS gamejam, and it was made to run with the GZDoom engine, made in Slade and Ultimate Doom Builder. It was a fun learning experience that I hope it can be of amusement. 

This game is completely standalone, and only requires GZDoom to play. So if you wanna know more about the engine, click the link below: https://zdoom.org/index

Also, this game was made with huge help from this standalone file by calcium_chan. Check it out here: https://calcium-chan.itch.io/gzdoom-standalone-iwad
